title: Reservations and E-Commerce
description: Built Zero’s end-to-end e-commerce platform in the U.S., enabling reservations, full online purchases, and a Past Editions sales experience. Delivered mobile-first UX, API integrations, and lean MVPs that drove 450+ orders.

title: Unified Lead and Dealer Locator System
description: Delivered a cross-functional initiative connecting Zero’s lead forms and dealer network — resulting in a 34% improvement in lead accuracy and consistent data standards across global CRM and marketing systems.
